actions.name: Chromatic Radiance

cost.trigger: The user resolves a Fire-Type attack, and Sunny Weather is present.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user resolves a Fire-Type attack, and Sunny Weather is present.

Effect: The user recovers 3 Ticks of HP.

actions.name: Chromatic Radiance
actions.description:
Trigger: The user recovers HP.

Effect: Allies within Range recover a Tick of HP. In Sunny Weather, this Ability triggers a second time.

actions.name: Sacred Fire
actions.description: Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 50% chance of gaining @Affliction[burn] 7.

actions.name: Sacred Fire (Burned)
actions.description:
Trigger: Valid target(s) have @Affliction[burn].

Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 50% chance of gaining @Affliction[burn] 7 and a 50% chance of gaining @Affliction[splinter] 7.

system.description: Effect: Connection - Sacred Fire. When using a Fire-Type attack while Sunny Weather is active, the user recovers 3 Ticks of HP. Any time the user recovers HP, allies within 10m recover a Tick of HP, which is doubled in Sunny Weather.
